We just had a great two presentations on network science and how useful it is.  This tool measures the curvature on the graph.  So in physics, when we have a lot of matter in the same spot, it pulls everything towards  it.  So black holes are going to pull planets towards it, pull your spaceship towards it.  And the same thing happens in networks.  When we have a lot of things that are connected in the same area of the graph, processes that  happen on a graph tend to get pulled into there.
